Details: Both agents provide comprehensive analyses of SSIS-to-Python conversion with similar conclusions about conversion accuracy and optimization needs. Agent 2 provides more structured and detailed analysis with better organization and comprehensive coverage of technical aspects.

Both outputs address the same core goal of analyzing SSIS package conversion to Python. They cover identical key areas: conversion accuracy, discrepancies, optimization suggestions, and recommendations. However, Agent 2 provides more comprehensive technical depth and structured analysis while Agent 1 focuses on high-level summary points.

Agent 1 uses a summary-style structure with basic sections (Summary, Conversion Accuracy, Discrepancies, etc.). Agent 2 employs a more systematic numbered approach (1. Summary, 2. Conversion Accuracy, etc.) with detailed subsections and comprehensive coverage including technical specifications and test coverage analysis.
